name: XEXEXE.EXE.EXE
description:
The backrooms creature strikes back to a new name, XEXEXE.EXE.EXE!

Your stuck in a house on California, The abandoned house your are stuck in, There's only one thing about the house, THERE IS NO ESCAPE! No running place, Just you holding a gun.

Developed originally for Choose Your Horror Game Jam
